txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: broken great swords from the Susi-väki surrounding the encampment at Pynti-peldot. Deliver the items to Lauri, one of the Lossoth-scouts.
'These men who entreat with such beasts are an enemy of ours. Thank you.'

'The men who revere the wolf have long been an enemy in our hunting grounds, but the chill wind of the east has changed them, made them more aggressive, and now they strive to kill our people. Something must be done and proof must be given.'
The Lossoth-scout Lauri at Pynti-peldot awaits the delivery of broken great swords.
Deliver the broken great swords to Lauri at Pynti-peldot in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver broken great swords from the Gauredain surrounding the encampment of Pynti-peldot to Lauri, a Lossoth-scout.
Wanted: broken great swords from the Susi-väki surrounding the encampment at Pynti-peldot.
